title: Creative Solution
description: You work with your kingdom’s scholars, thinkers, and practitioners of magical and mundane experimentation to come up with new ways to resolve issues when business as usual is just not working. Attempt a basic check.

criticalSuccess.msg: You can call upon the solution to aid in resolving any Kingdom skill check made during the remainder of this Kingdom turn <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="creative-solution" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Creative Solution</button>. Do so when a Kingdom skill check is rolled, but before you learn the result. Immediately reroll that check with a +2 circumstance bonus; you must take the new result. If you don’t use your Creative Solution by the end of this turn, you lose this benefit and gain 10XP instead.

success.msg: You can call upon the solution to aid in resolving any Kingdom skill check made during the remainder of this Kingdom turn <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="creative-solution" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Creative Solution</button>. Do so when a Kingdom skill check is rolled, but before you learn the result. Immediately reroll that check with a +2 circumstance bonus; you must take the new result. If you don’t use your Creative Solution by the end of this turn, you lose this benefit and gain 10XP instead. In addition, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1d4">Lose 1d4 Resource Points</button> to research the solution. This cost is paid now, whether or not you use your Creative Solution.

failure.msg: Your attempt at researching is a failure and you <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="2d6">Lose 2d6 Resource Points</button>. It provides no advantage.

criticalFailure.msg: Your attempt at researching is a failure and you <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="resource-points" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="2d6">Lose 2d6 Resource Points</button>. It provides no advantage. In addition, your scholars and thinkers are so frustrated that you take a –1 circumstance penalty to Culture-based checks until the end of the next Kingdom turn.

special: You cannot influence a check with Supernatural Solution and Creative Solution simultaneously.
